Properties_or_Attributes_Kind/Property or Attribute/Unit of Measure/Unit by Category/Unit of Volume/Drop Unit of Volume/Medical Drop
Equipment_Kind/Diagnostic, Therapeutic, and Research Equipment/Pharmaceutical Dosage Form/Drops
Record.Description: A liquid preparation which has to be administered in a drop-wise fashion, in doses measured by drops.
A unit of volume used in pharmacy and equal to 0.05 milliliter (20 drops/ml).
A unit of volume equal to approximately 0.08333 milliliter (1 mL = 12 medical drops).
